meanings.sent1: The endmost seat in the row was vacant.
meanings.sent2: The last page of the book is the endmost one.
meanings.sent3: The endmost cookie in the jar always disappears first.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed in the endmost corners of the room.
meanings.sent5: The endmost star in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.sent1: The endmost house on the street had a red door.
meanings.sent2: The endmost island in the archipelago is uninhabited.
meanings.sent3: The endmost tree in the forest waved goodbye to the hikers.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts wandered to the endmost reaches of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The endmost cloud in the sky cast a shadow over the valley.

meanings.sent1: The endmost chapter of the book revealed the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The endmost mile of the marathon was the toughest.
meanings.sent3: The endmost student to arrive was always late.
meanings.sent4: Her journey took her to the endmost corners of the earth.
meanings.sent5: The endmost note in the melody lingered in the air.
